description:
Rope bondage duo the Two Knotty Boys (JD and Dan) teach their ultimate live workshop together, sharing some of their most popular bondage ties that have made them famous in books and performances worldwide.
Featuring Iona Grace, Krysta Kaos, and Odile as their models, the Two Knotty Boys demonstrate how to tie the Basic Wrap, the Cat's Paw wrist restraint, the Dragonfly Sleeve, and other Western-based fusion bondage techniques.
title: Two Knotty Boys - Live Workshop
